languages.text: "{name}, жду твоих приказов. Мне не впервые участвовать в подавлении бунтов. Помни — чем жестче мы сокрушим его, тем лучше".
"{name}, I stand by for your orders. This is not the first time I've participated in suppressing a rebellion. Remember, the more ruthlessly we crush it, the better the outcome will be."
languages.original_text: "{name}, жду твоих приказов. Мне не впервые учавствовать в подавлении бунтов. Помни — чем жестче мы сокрушим его, тем лучше".

traits.locale_text: "{name}, I stand by for your orders. I have participated in suppressing rebellions before. Bear in mind that the more ruthlessly we crush him, the better the outcome."
"{name}, I stand by for your orders. I have participated in suppressing rebellions before. Bear in mind that the more ruthlessly we crush him, the better the outcome."
"{name}, I stand by for your orders. This is not the first time I've participated in suppressing a rebellion. Remember, the more ruthlessly we crush it, the better the outcome will be."
"{name}, I stand by for your orders. This is not the first time I've participated in suppressing a rebellion. Remember, the more ruthlessly we crush it, the better the outcome will be."

languages.text: 「{name}、命令を待っている。反乱を潰すのは初めてじゃない。覚えとけ、容赦なく叩き潰すほど、結果は良くなる」
languages.original_text: "{name}, I stand by for your orders. This is not the first time I've participated in suppressing a rebellion. Remember, the more ruthlessly we crush it, the better the outcome will be."

traits.locale_text: 「{name}、命令を待っている。反乱を潰すのは初めてじゃない。覚えとけ、容赦なく叩き潰すほど、結果は良くなる。」

languages.text: «Aguardo sus órdenes, {name}. No es la primera vez que participo en la supresión de una revuelta. Recuerde que cuanto más implacable sean sus medidas, más positivo será el desenlace».
languages.original_text: "{name}, I stand by for your orders. This is not the first time I've participated in suppressing a rebellion. Remember, the more ruthlessly we crush it, the better the outcome will be."

traits.locale_text: «Aguardo sus órdenes, {name}. No es la primera vez que participo en la supresión de una revuelta. Recuerde que cuanto más implacable sean sus medidas, más positivo será el desenlace».

languages.text: “我时刻等待你的命令，{name}，这并不是我第一次镇压这样的叛乱。切记，我们粉碎叛军的手段越是无情，结果就会越令人满意。”
languages.original_text: "{name}, I stand by for your orders. This is not the first time I've participated in suppressing a rebellion. Remember, the more ruthlessly we crush it, the better the outcome will be."

traits.locale_text: “我时刻等待你的命令，{name}，这并不是我第一次镇压这样的叛乱。切记，我们粉碎叛军的手段越是无情，结果就会越令人满意。”

languages.text: "{name}, Ich erwarte Eure Befehle. Das ist nicht das erste Mal, dass ich an der Eindämmung einer Rebellion beteiligt bin. Denkt daran. Je brutaler wir sie niederschlagen, desto besser wird das Ergebnis sein."
languages.original_text: "{name}, I stand by for your orders. This is not the first time I've participated in suppressing a rebellion. Remember, the more ruthlessly we crush it, the better the outcome will be."

traits.locale_text: "{name}, Ich erwarte Eure Befehle. Das ist nicht das erste Mal, dass ich an der Eindämmung einer Rebellion beteiligt bin. Denkt daran. Je brutaler wir sie niederschlagen, desto besser wird das Ergebnis sein."

languages.text: « {name}, j'attends vos ordres. Ce n'est pas la première fois que j'aide à étouffer une révolte. N'oubliez pas, plus violemment nous l'écraserons, plus le résultat en vaudra la peine. »
languages.original_text: "{name}, I stand by for your orders. This is not the first time I've participated in suppressing a rebellion. Remember, the more ruthlessly we crush it, the better the outcome will be."

traits.locale_text: « {name}, j'attends vos ordres. Ce n'est pas la première fois que j'aide à étouffer une révolte. N'oubliez pas, plus violemment nous l'écraserons, plus le résultat en vaudra la peine. »

languages.text: "{name}, emir bekliyorum. Bir isyanın bastırılmasında ilk kez yer almıyorum. Ne kadar acımasızca ezecek olursak sonuç da o kadar iyi olur."
languages.original_text: "{name}, I stand by for your orders. This is not the first time I've participated in suppressing a rebellion. Remember, the more ruthlessly we crush it, the better the outcome will be."

traits.locale_text: "{name}, emir bekliyorum. Bir isyanın bastırılmasında ilk kez yer almıyorum. Ne kadar acımasızca ezecek olursak sonuç da o kadar iyi olur."
